name: Watch Your Back !: Train Surfing
description:
This game is our first product and the game has been participate to a competition but didn't manage to get to the final :)

Nonetheless, we put all our love and passion into this game. Not perfect but it's a one big step to going forward and hopefully, able to achieve more in the future.

Best of luck to all of you.

Chandra, Founder of The Farmers Studio.

NB : If you had anything to say about the game or just want to connect with us, feel free to reach our instagram: @thefarmers.studio
